name: autohide the header (+no ads) [Gannett newspapers]
description: Auto-hides the page header<!--, page footer, and sidebar-->; mouse over the blue placeholder to restore it. Hides ads, ad-like syndicated content (like Taboola), and other ad-like nuisances.
additional_info:
This lets you see more of the article content without scrolling, but the truth is, the current USA Today layout is pretty clean even without this. All of Gannett's papers, and at least one MediaNews paper, use exactly the same layout. The style works on all of them.
